languages.text: "Я помню это место другим — пылающим, агонирующим, захлебывающимся кровью... Таким оно нравилось мне больше. Дай знать, если захочешь вернуть его к былому великолепию".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Как скучно вы живете мон-кай, где же кровавые арены, где пыточные?

languages.text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."
languages.original_text: "Я помню это место другим — пылающим, агонирующим, захлебывающимся кровью... Таким оно нравилось мне больше. Дай знать, если захочешь вернуть его к былому великолепию".

traits.locale_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."
"I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."
"I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."
"I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."
"I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

languages.text: “我记得这个地方以前不是这个样子。这座城市熊熊燃烧，淹没在痛苦与鲜血之中……我更喜欢那个样子。如果你打算让这座城市恢复往日的风采，只要和我说一声就好了。”
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: “我记得这个地方以前不是这个样子。这座城市熊熊燃烧，淹没在痛苦与鲜血之中……我更喜欢那个样子。如果你打算让这座城市恢复往日的风采，只要和我说一声就好了。”

languages.text: 「ここはこんなんじゃなかった。燃えさかり、苦痛に満ち、血にまみれ…おれはそっちのほうが好みだがな。前の派手な状態に戻ったところが見たかったら、声をけてくれ」
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: 「ここはこんなんじゃなかった。燃えさかり、苦痛に満ち、血にまみれ…おれはそっちのほうが好みだがな。前の派手な状態に戻ったところが見たかったら、声をけてくれ」

languages.text: « Je garde un souvenir différent de cet endroit, lorsqu'il brûlait dans les flammes, agonisait, baignait dans le sang... Je le préférais ainsi. Prévenez-moi si vous souhaitez qu'il retrouve son lustre d'antan. »
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: « Je garde un souvenir différent de cet endroit, lorsqu'il brûlait dans les flammes, agonisait, baignait dans le sang... Je le préférais ainsi. Prévenez-moi si vous souhaitez qu'il retrouve son lustre d'antan. »

languages.text: «Recuerdo el estado de este lugar antes: había llamas por todas partes y estaba todo cubierto de sangre... Me gustaba más así. Si desea que recupere su antiguo esplendor, hágamelo saber».
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: «Recuerdo el estado de este lugar antes: había llamas por todas partes y estaba todo cubierto de sangre... Me gustaba más así. Si desea que recupere su antiguo esplendor, hágamelo saber».

languages.text: "Ich erinnere mich an eine Zeit, als dieser Ort anders aussah ... brennend, quälend, voller Blut ... Der Anblick gefiel mir besser. Lasst es mich wissen, wenn ich seinen einstigen Glanz wiederherstellen soll."
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: "Ich erinnere mich an eine Zeit, als dieser Ort anders aussah ... brennend, quälend, voller Blut ... Der Anblick gefiel mir besser. Lasst es mich wissen, wenn ich seinen einstigen Glanz wiederherstellen soll."

languages.text: "Burasının bambaşka olduğu günler aklımdan çıkmıyor... Yananlar, can çekişenler, kendi kanında boğulanlar... O hâlini tercih ederdim. O eski ihtişamına yeniden kavuştuğunu görmek istersen bana haber ver."
languages.original_text: "I remember when this place looked different — burning, agonising, drowning in blood... I preferred it that way. Let me know if you would like to see it restored to its former lustre."

traits.locale_text: "Burasının bambaşka olduğu günler, hâlâ aklımdan çıkmıyor... Yananlar, can çekişenler, kendi kanında boğulanlar... O hâlini tercih ederdim. Yeniden o eski ihtişamına kavuşmasını görmek istersen bana haber ver."
